nodes.title: README
widgets_values:
#### Hello, this is my simplified I2V workflow. 

>First add **--novram** to the **run_nvidia_gpu.bat** file, then you need to **download and load the models**.
>
>After expanding the subgraph **Image 2 Video Workflow** you will see download links - download the models, place them in the correct folders, load them via the nodes, refresh ComfyUI (R key), then come back here and just generate.
---
All necessary settings are in the node below. Click the top-right corner of the node to **open the subgraph** 
ðŸ‘‡

After a brief pause, three Welsh mountain ponies begin to move again. The chestnut brown horse lifts its head from the grass, the dappled gray turns its body slightly, and the pale white steps forward first, leading the direction. The camera holds a medium-wide shot at body height as all three align and start walking together across the hillside. Their movement is slow and unhurried, with light wind moving through their manes and grass brushing softly against their legs. The scene feels purposeful but calm, as if the horses have chosen where to go next.

nodes.title: Grab the models
widgets_values:
## In this workflow I'm using these models:

**Checkpoint**
- [ltx-2-19b-dev-fp8.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/blob/main/ltx-2-19b-dev-fp8.safetensors)

**Text Encoder**
- [gemma_3_12B_it_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/GitMylo/LTX-2-comfy_gemma_fp8_e4m3fn/blob/main/gemma_3_12B_it_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors)

**Loras**
- [ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora-384.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/blob/main/ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora-384.safetensors)

- [ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-detailer.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2-19b-IC-LoRA-Detailer/blob/main/ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-detailer.safetensors)

**Spatial Upscale**
- [ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/blob/main/ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors)

**Model Storage Location**

```
ðŸ“‚ ComfyUI/

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ðŸ“‚ checkpoints/
â”‚   â”‚      â””â”€â”€ ltx-2-19b-dev-fp8.safetensors
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ðŸ“‚ text_encoders/
â”‚   â”‚      â”œâ”€â”€ gemma_3_12B_it_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ðŸ“‚ loras/ 
â”‚   â”‚      â””â”€â”€ ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora-384.safetensors
â”‚   â”‚      â””â”€â”€ ltx-2-19b-ic-lora-detailer.safetensors
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ðŸ“‚ latent_upscale_models/ 
â”‚          â””â”€â”€ ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors

```

inputs.text: A medium close-up shot features a Caucasian man with a closely shaven head and face, wearing a black baseball cap with "PNTR" in white letters on the front, and a dark grey t-shirt with "JUST DO IT" visible across his chest. A small black microphone is clipped to his shirt collar. He is positioned slightly to the left of the frame, looking intently downwards and to his right, his eyes focused off-camera. His facial expression is one of deep concentration, with his brow slightly furrowed. As he looks down, a quick sniff sound is heard, and then he speaks with a deep male voice and a slightly frustrated tone, saying, "I think it's so bad." The camera remains static throughout, maintaining a shallow depth of field, which keeps the man in sharp focus while the background is softly blurred, revealing a light-colored wall with white wooden shelving or trim, and a partially open white wooden door on the right. After a brief pause, another short, audible sniff is heard. The man then continues to speak, his voice maintaining the same quality, as he states, "So bad. So bad." He elaborates further, emphasizing his point with a final statement, "This got to be, it's got to be the worst tool I've ever seen."
